data.name: Leonicorn Swap
data.description: What is Leonicorn Swap [LEOS]? Leonicorn Swap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built and running on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). The decentralized exchange introduces to the cryptocurrency industry new and advanced features that let Leonicorn Swap users earn and win tokens. Among the notable features include operating based on the Automated Market Makers (AMM) model and a non-fungible token (NFT) marketplace. This has helped project team build one of the most innovative platforms to allow users to trade digital assets and give them full control over their money and investment decisions. Leonicorn Swap is truly decentralized with the most user-friendly, efficient, and secure cryptocurrency solutions leveraging blockchain technology. Who are the Founders of Leonicorn Swap? Founder and CEO of Leonicorn Swap is Mofassair Hossain. Mofassair is one of the top 10 Blockchain Start-up Marketing Advisers of 2018. He raised 600M USD over 5 years for more than 60 Projects. Besides he is a Member of Global Blockchain advisory professionals. In his profession, he is a Chartered Management Account (CIMA). What are advantages of Leonicorn Swap? Competing advantage lies in two aspects namely having built on top of the Binance Smart Chain network and giving Leonicorn Swap users a wide variety of income opportunities. Building project solution on Binance Smart Chain ensures Leonicorn Swap extends fast transactions at the lowest fee possible, in the market Leonicorn Swap rates can go as low as 1 cent. Further, Leonicorn Swap has built a user-friendly interface meaning anyone can access and use its platform irrespective of technical background. Leonicorn Swap as well allows users to enjoy a high performance and decentralized trading experience supported by the AMM model and powered by its native cryptocurrency namely LEOS token. Finally, Leonicorn Swap building a robust DeFi and NFT ecosystem which will be significant to presenting investors with a wide range of investment opportunities. How many Leonicorn Swap [LEOS] Tokens Are There In Circulation? Leonicorn Swap has minted 210 million tokens as Max Supply with 3.1 billion in Circulating Supply. How is the Leonicorn Swap Network Secured? As an Binance Smart Chain-based token, LEOS is secured by Proof of Authority (PoA) and Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS) consensus mechanism. Unlike the proof-of-work [PoW] consensus utilized by Bitcoin, PoSA relies on the amount of staked tokens for selecting node validators. Where can you buy Leonicorn Swap [LEOS]? LEOS tokens can be purchased on Pancake Swap at the moment. The number of exchanges is increasing.
